title: MarQ by Flipkart M3 Smart (M3) (Blue,32GB)( 2GB RAM)  (2 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Battery, Charger, USB Cable, Screen Guard, Warranty Card, User Manual
product_specification.Operating Frequency: 2G: B3/B8, 3G: B1/B8, 4G LTE FDD: B1/B3/B5/B8, 4G LTE TDD: B38/B40/B41
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: 13MP + Bokeh Lens Dual Rear Camera, Night mode, Beauty Mode, Time lapse, Slow Motion Video
product_specification.Other Features: Face Unlock, Notification Light, Screen Mirror/Cast
product_specification.Warranty Summary: One Year for Handset, 6 Months for Accessories

product_description.Power 5000 mAh Battery: This MarQ M3 Smart’s 5000-mAh battery offers you a standby time of about 28 days (2G Network) on a single full charge. It offers you about 24 hours of music, 9 hours of movie-watching, and around 42 hours of call time, and much more.
product_description.Dual Rear Camera Setup: The MarQ M3 Smart comes with a dual rear-camera set-up (13 MP + Bokeh Lens) and a 5-megapixel front camera that let you take stunning pictures as well as selfies. Apart from that, you get to enjoy varied camera modes, such as Slow-motion, HRD Mode, and Time Lapse, among others.
product_description.Stunning Visuals: The MarQ M3 Smart’s 15.46 cm (6.1) HD+ Full View Dewdrop Display enriches your favourite video by making it look more immersive on the large screen.
product_description.Sleek and Curved Design: Its 2.5D curved glass and sleek design give the mobile phone a finish that feels smooth in your hands, and it gives others a reason to stop and take a look at it.
product_description.Reverse Charging Technology: Thanks to this technology, you can use the MarQ M3 smartphone as a portable charger to recharge other compatible smart devices.
product_description.Face Unlock: You can use your face to unlock this mobile phone with ease. This ensures convenience and enhanced security.
product_description.Enhance Your Productivity: This mobile phone is equipped with 2+1 Slots for Dual NanoSIM Cards and Micro SD Card so that you can keep your productivity high.
product_description.Durable and Powerful: Tested over 3000 times, this mobile phone ensures long-lasting as well as a strong performance.
product_description.Fast Processor: With a 1.6-GHz octa-core processor and up to 2 GB of RAM, this mobile phone facilitates powerful smartphone performance, helping you multitask with ease. It also has about 32 GB of ROM (expandable up to 256 GB), which you can take advantage of to store all your essential applications, pictures, and more.

review:
Way to go Flipkart. You have nailed it.

Initial experience -
I was pleasantly surprised with the quick delivery of the phone.
On opening the package, I was even more surprised pleasantly, as not only the phone but it's battery and charger are also made in India.
The phone has a removable battery.
The phone has a nice blue colour.
The phone is easy to set up. Performance of the phone is decent as it did not lag (normal usage with social media etc.). Full charging takes slightly over 2 hours and then it easily lasts for 2 days with normal usage. A screen guard was also given along with the phone.

To summarise the positives and not so positives of the phone -
Positives - Made in India; Good performance; Huge battery; 2 sim slots + 1 data card slot; Value for money.
Negatives - None found till now.

Very Nice Mobile From Indian Brand. Good Battery Backup. Nice Cameras. Sound level in Prefect. I give 5 out 5 for this Mobile

But Few Things Need to update in this Mobile.
1.Please increase the RAM Memory.
2.Auto Brightness is not Available.
3.If Possible add Finger Print sensor in next model.

Thinking about the low budget and how the performance I felt very happy photos are excellent and the pixels are not broken
The volume for speaker is also good battery back up is alo excellent
I wonder about the zoom mode for the mobile and enable full screen picture where we can find only in mobiles cost more than 10k
Another removable battery helps us if any accidental water damage we can aave the very quickly by removing battery immediately
Worth for every penny we spend
Very bad mobile Heating daily don't perched 🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫❌❌❌❌❌❌❌❌❌❌🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫 Don't Waste your Money 🚫
